info.author: HuggingFace Inc. Special Ops Team
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.name: optimum-neuron
info.summary: Optimum Neuron is the interface between the Hugging Face Transformers and Diffusers libraries and AWS Tranium and Inferentia accelerators. It provides a set of tools enabling easy model loading, training and inference on single and multiple neuron core settings for different downstream tasks.
